item.title: Publish Hugo site with GitHub Actions
item.description: The peaceiris/actions-gh-pages action allows to publish a Hugo site in your GitHub Action. name: <PIPELINE> jobs: build: runs-on: <RUN_ON> steps: - name: Deploy Website uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} publish_dir: <PUBLISH_DIR> force_orphan: true cname: <CNAME> <PIPELINE>: The name of your pipeline. <RUN_ON>: The runner to use, see GitHub’s own documentation for possible values. <PUBLISH_DIR>: The file system location of the built site. <CNAME>: The CNAME of your custom domain.
